spell_tooltip.description: Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Call down a burst of energy, causing 368,327 Arcane damage to the target, and 46,355 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 10 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 12 Astral Power.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 622,954 Astral damage.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

While in this form, single-target attacks against you have a 15% chance to make your next Starfire instant.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.

A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 37,721 Nature damage and then an additional 483,097 Nature damage over 18 sec to the primary target and all enemies within 8 yards.

Generates 6 Astral Power.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Reduces the remaining cooldown on Solar Beam by 15 sec when it interrupts the primary target.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Wrath, Starsurge, and Starfire damage increased by 5%.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Blasts targets within 20 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
Magical damage dealt by your spells increased by 5%.
You retain Lycara's Teachings' bonus from your most recent shapeshift form for 5 sec after shifting out of it, provided you remained in that form for 2.9 sec, reduced by Haste.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.
For 15 sec, all single-target damage also heals a nearby friendly target for 20% of the damage done.

Casting 2 Starfires empowers Wrath for 15 sec. Casting 2 Wraths empowers Starfire for 15 sec.

 Eclipse (Solar)
Nature spells deal 15% additional damage and Wrath damage is increased by 60%.

 Eclipse (Lunar)
Arcane spells deal 15% additional damage and the damage Starfire deals to nearby enemies is increased by 60%.
Moonfire and Sunfire damage over time has a chance to call down a falling star, dealing 71,731 Astral damage and generating 2 Astral Power.
Summons a beam of solar light over an enemy target's location, interrupting the target and silencing all enemies within the beam. Lasts 8 sec.
During the first 6 sec of every Eclipse, Shooting Stars fall 200% more often.
Your next 3 Starfires are instant cast and generate 30% increased Astral Power.
Moonfire deals 10% increased damage and also hits another nearby enemy within 15 yds of the target.
Your Wrath and Starfire chance to critically strike is increased by 10% and they generate 2 additional Astral Power.
When Eclipse ends or when you enter combat, enter a Dreamstate, reducing the cast time of your next 2 Starfires or Wraths by 40%.
Casting Starfall extends the duration of active Moonfires and Sunfires by 3.0 sec, up to 28 sec.
Your Starfire and Wrath damage has a 35% chance to cause the target to languish for an additional 60% of your spell's damage over 6 sec.
Celestial bodies align, maintaining both Eclipses and granting 10% haste for 12 sec.

Solar Eclipse increases the damage of Wrath by an additional 20%. 

Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage by 15% and the damage it deals to nearby enemies by an additional 30%.

Sunfire damage has a chance to grow a magical mushroom at a target's location. After 1 sec, the mushroom detonates, dealing 384,759 Nature damage and then an additional 217,032 Nature damage over 10 sec. Affected targets are slowed by 50%.

Generates up to 20 Astral Power based on targets hit.
Solar Eclipse increases Wrath's Astral Power generation by 60% and Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage and Astral Power generation by 20% for each target hit beyond the first, up to 60%.
Incarnation: Chosen of Elune's cooldown is reduced to 100 seconds and it has two charges, but its duration is reduced by 20%.
Your Moonfire, Sunfire, and Stellar Flare deal damage 25% more frequently.
Wrath and Starfire have a 20% chance to cause your next Wrath or Starfire cast during an Eclipse to become Astral and deal 75% additional damage.

Starsurge and Starfall grant you 8% Haste for 15 sec.

Stacks up to 3 times. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.
When you have 3 periodic effects from your spells on a target, your damage and healing on them are increased by 6%.
Every other Eclipse creates a Fury of Elune at 25% effectiveness that follows your current target for 8 sec.
Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by 20%, decreasing by 2% every 1 sec.
Consuming Umbral Embrace increases the damage of your Moonfire, Sunfire, Stellar Flare, Shooting Stars, and Starfall by 30% for 6 sec.
Starsurge and Starfall deal 8% increased damage and their cost is reduced by 10%.
Starsurge or Starfall increase your current Eclipse's Arcane or Nature damage bonus by an additional 2%, up to 6%.

An improved Moonkin Form that grants both Eclipses, any learned Celestial Alignment bonuses, and 10% critical strike chance.

Lasts 16 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Moonkin Form for its duration.

Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy that follows the enemy, dealing up to 868,685 Astral damage over 8 sec within its area. Damage reduced on secondary targets.

Generates 40 Astral Power over its duration.

New Moon, Half Moon, and Full Moon deal 25% increased damage. Full Moon becomes Full Moon once more before resetting to New Moon.

Fury of Elune deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Fury of Elune
Fury of Elune now ends with a flash of energy, blasting nearby enemies for 464,757 Astral damage.

 Full Moon
New Moon and Half Moon call down 1 Minor Moon and Full Moon calls down 2 Minor Moons that deal 269,147 Astral damage and generate 3 Astral Power.
Moonfire and Starfire generate 2 additional Astral Power.
Moonfire deals 20% additional damage.
Bear Form and Moonkin Form reduce Arcane damage taken by 6% and all other magic damage taken by 3%.
Each non-Arcane damaging ability you use increases the damage of your next Arcane damaging ability by 3%, stacking up to 3 times.
Enemies damaged by Full Moon or Fury of Elune take 6% increased damage from you for 6 sec.
Using Wild Charge while in Bear Form or Moonkin Form incurs a 3 sec shorter cooldown.
Starfire deals 160% increased damage to its primary target, but no longer triggers Solar Eclipse.

Moonfire damage has a chance to call down a Fury of Elune to follow your target for 3 sec.

 Fury of Elune
Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy, dealing 322,048 Astral damage over 3 sec within its area.

Generates 15 Astral Power over its duration.
Your Arcane abilities reduce the cooldown of Fury of Elune by 2.0 sec and the cooldown of New Moon, Half Moon, and Full Moon by 1.0 sec.

Further increases the power of Boundless Moonlight.

 Fury of Elune
The flash of energy now generates 6 Astral Power and its damage is increased by 50%.

 Full Moon
New Moon and Half Moon now also call down 1 Minor Moon.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Call down a burst of energy, causing 369,104 Arcane damage to the target, and 46,435 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 10 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 12 Astral Power.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 617,591 Astral damage.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

While in this form, single-target attacks against you have a 15% chance to make your next Starfire instant.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.

A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 37,077 Nature damage and then an additional 483,097 Nature damage over 18 sec to the primary target and all enemies within 8 yards.

Generates 6 Astral Power.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Reduces the remaining cooldown on Solar Beam by 15 sec when it interrupts the primary target.

Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.

Moonkin Form: Mastery

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.

Arcane spells deal 15% additional damage and the damage Starfire deals to nearby enemies is increased by 60%.

Lasts 16 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Moonkin Form for its duration.

Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy that follows the enemy, dealing up to 870,823 Astral damage over 8 sec within its area. Damage reduced on secondary targets.

Generates 40 Astral Power over its duration.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 3%.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.

When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 328,076 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Roots the target and all enemies within 12 yards in place for 10 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Well-Honed Instincts can trigger up to once every 90 sec.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
Magical damage dealt by your spells increased by 5%.
You retain Lycara's Teachings' bonus from your most recent shapeshift form for 5 sec after shifting out of it, provided you remained in that form for 2.9 sec, reduced by Haste.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.

 Eclipse (Lunar)

Summons a beam of solar light over an enemy target's location, interrupting the target and silencing all enemies within the beam. Lasts 8 sec.
During the first 6 sec of every Eclipse, Shooting Stars fall 200% more often.

Summons a stand of 3 Treants for 10 sec which immediately taunt and attack enemies in the targeted area.

Generates 20 Astral Power.
Your Wrath and Starfire chance to critically strike is increased by 10% and they generate 2 additional Astral Power.

While in combat you generate 2 Astral Power every 3 sec.

While out of combat your Astral Power rebalances to 50 instead of depleting to empty.
When Eclipse ends or when you enter combat, enter a Dreamstate, reducing the cast time of your next 2 Starfires or Wraths by 40%.
Your Starfire and Wrath damage has a 35% chance to cause the target to languish for an additional 60% of your spell's damage over 6 sec.
Celestial bodies align, maintaining both Eclipses and granting 10% haste for 12 sec.

Solar Eclipse increases the damage of Wrath by an additional 20%. 

Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage by 15% and the damage it deals to nearby enemies by an additional 30%.

Sunfire damage has a chance to grow a magical mushroom at a target's location. After 1 sec, the mushroom detonates, dealing 384,759 Nature damage and then an additional 217,032 Nature damage over 10 sec. Affected targets are slowed by 50%.

Generates up to 20 Astral Power based on targets hit.
Starsurge increases the damage the target takes from your periodic effects and Shooting Stars by 20% for 5 sec. Reapplying this effect extends its duration, up to 20 sec.
Incarnation: Chosen of Elune's cooldown is reduced to 100 seconds and it has two charges, but its duration is reduced by 20%.

Casting Wrath in an Eclipse has a 18% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.

Casting Starfire in an Eclipse has a 25% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.
The critical strike damage of your Astral spells is increased by 20%.
Your Moonfire, Sunfire, and Stellar Flare deal damage 25% more frequently.
Wrath and Starfire have a 20% chance to cause your next Wrath or Starfire cast during an Eclipse to become Astral and deal 75% additional damage.

Starsurge and Starfall grant you 8% Haste for 15 sec.

Stacks up to 3 times. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.
When you have 3 periodic effects from your spells on a target, your damage and healing on them are increased by 6%.
Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by 20%, decreasing by 2% every 1 sec.
Consuming Umbral Embrace increases the damage of your Moonfire, Sunfire, Stellar Flare, Shooting Stars, and Starfall by 30% for 6 sec.
Starsurge has a chance to summon the Spirit of Goldrinn, which immediately deals 280,804 Astral damage to the target.
Starsurge and Starfall deal 8% increased damage and their cost is reduced by 10%.
Starsurge or Starfall increase your current Eclipse's Arcane or Nature damage bonus by an additional 2%, up to 6%.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 16 Druid spells and abilities over 4 sec.

You will cast Ferocious Bite, Shred, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Your Moonfire and Sunfire have a chance to summon a Faerie Dragon to assist you in battle for 30 sec.
Your Force of Nature treants cast Moonfire on nearby targets about once every 6 sec.
Your maximum mana is increased by 5% and your maximum Astral Power is increased by 20.
Your Regrowth protects you, reducing damage you take by 8% while your Regrowth is on you.
Your Force of Nature treants no longer taunt and deal 200% increased melee damage.
Entering Eclipse increases your Haste by 12% for 6 sec.

Wrath and Starfire damage increased by 10%. 

Regrowth and Wild Growth healing increased by 9%.
Force of Nature cooldown reduced by 15 sec.

Time elapsed while your major abilities are available to be used or at maximum charges is subtracted from that ability's cooldown after the next time you use it, up to 15 seconds.

Affects Force of Nature, Incarnation: Chosen of Elune, and Convoke the Spirits.

Every 5 Regrowths you cast makes your next Wrath, Starfire, or Entangling Roots instant and increases damage it deals by 100%.

Every 5 Starsurges or Starfalls you cast makes your next Regrowth or Entangling roots instant.
Each of your Force of Nature treants increases damage your spells deal by 8% while active.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Call down a burst of energy, causing 363,371 Arcane damage to the target, and 46,094 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 10 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 12 Astral Power.

When you have 3 periodic effects from your spells on a target, your damage and healing on them are increased by 6%.

Consuming Umbral Embrace increases the damage of your Moonfire, Sunfire, Stellar Flare, Shooting Stars, and Starfall by 30% for 6 sec.
Starsurge and Starfall deal 8% increased damage and their cost is reduced by 10%.
Starsurge or Starfall increase your current Eclipse's Arcane or Nature damage bonus by an additional 2%, up to 6%.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 16 Druid spells and abilities over 4 sec.

You will cast Ferocious Bite, Shred, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Your Moonfire and Sunfire have a chance to summon a Faerie Dragon to assist you in battle for 30 sec.
Your Force of Nature treants cast Moonfire on nearby targets about once every 6 sec.
Your maximum mana is increased by 5% and your maximum Astral Power is increased by 20.
Your Regrowth protects you, reducing damage you take by 8% while your Regrowth is on you.
Your Force of Nature treants no longer taunt and deal 200% increased melee damage.
Entering Eclipse increases your Haste by 12% for 6 sec.

Wrath and Starfire damage increased by 10%. 

Regrowth and Wild Growth healing increased by 9%.
Force of Nature cooldown reduced by 15 sec.

Time elapsed while your major abilities are available to be used or at maximum charges is subtracted from that ability's cooldown after the next time you use it, up to 15 seconds.

Affects Force of Nature, Incarnation: Chosen of Elune, and Convoke the Spirits.

Every 5 Regrowths you cast makes your next Wrath, Starfire, or Entangling Roots instant and increases damage it deals by 100%.

Every 5 Starsurges or Starfalls you cast makes your next Regrowth or Entangling roots instant.
Each of your Force of Nature treants increases damage your spells deal by 8% while active.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.
Heals the target for 247,686 over 12 sec.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 196,688 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Forces the enemy target to sleep for up to 40 sec. Any damage will awaken the target. Only one target can be forced to hibernate at a time. Only works on Beasts and Dragonkin.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.

Heals the target for 315,435 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 187,504.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 200%.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Swiftmend heals the target for 181,215 over 9 sec.
Nature's Swiftness now has 2 charges.
For each Rejuvenation you have active, Regrowth's cost is reduced by 8% and critical effect chance is increased by 8%, up to a maximum of 96%.
Regrowth's initial heal has a 40% increased chance for a critical effect if the target is already affected by Regrowth.
Increases Omen of Clarity's chance to activate Clearcasting to 5% and Clearcasting can stack 1 additional time.

Abundance now also reduces the cast time of Regrowth by 5% per stack.

Cenarion Ward's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 24,597 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.6 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 45 yards for 1.4 million over 4.0 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 8,466 over 8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.
The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% for 12 sec.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.
The cooldown of Swiftmend is reduced by up to 40%, based on the current health of the target. Cooldown is reduced more when cast on a lower health target.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 24,852 over 6 sec.
Wild Growth heals 1 additional target.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.
Lifebloom counts for 3 stacks of Mastery: Harmony.
Wild Growth's healing falls off 30% less over time.

Shapeshift into the Tree of Life, increasing healing done by 10%, increasing armor by 120%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects. Functionality of Rejuvenation, Wild Growth, Regrowth, Entangling Roots, and Wrath is enhanced.

Lasts 30 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this form for its duration.

When you cast Starsurge, Rake, Shred, or Frenzied Regeneration you gain Heart of the Wild for 15 sec, once every 1 min.

 Heart of the Wild
Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Guardian: Bear Form gives an additional 20% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has 2 charges.

Restoration: Healing increased by 30%, and mana costs reduced by 50%.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Lifebloom's healing is increased by 6.0% each time it heals, up to 90%. Also increases Lifebloom's final bloom amount by 15%.

Wrath and Shred transfer 100% of their damage and Starfire and Swipe transfer 50% of their damage into healing onto a nearby ally. 

This effect is increased by 200% while Heart of the Wild is active.
Rejuvenation instantly heals your target for 30% of its total periodic effect and Regrowth's duration is increased by 6 sec.
Wild Growth has a 60% chance to cause your next Rejuvenation or Regrowth to apply to 2 additional allies within 20 yards of the target.

Damage and healing while in Cat Form increased by 3%.

Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.

Attacking from Prowl increases the chance for Shred, Rake, and Swipe to critically strike by 8% for 6 sec.

Casting Regrowth increases the chance for your periodic heals to critically heal by 8% for 10 sec.

Rip and Ferocious Bite damage increased by 5%.

Rejuvenation healing increased by 10%.

When you remove an effect with Soothe or Remove Corruption, gain a combo point and heal for 4% of your maximum health. If you are at full health an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
During Barkskin your movement speed is increased by 10% and every second flowers grow beneath your feet that heal up to 3 nearby injured allies for 20,189.
Your Regrowth's healing to yourself is increased by 35%.

Each active Bloodseeker Vine increases the damage your abilities deal by 2%.

Each active Symbiotic Bloom increases the healing of your spells by 2%.

When Bloodseeker Vines expire or you use Ferocious Bite on their target they explode in thorns, dealing 125,981 physical damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced above 5 targets.

When Symbiotic Blooms expire or you cast Rejuvenation on their target flowers grow around their target, healing them and up to 3 nearby allies for 21,792.

Bloodseeker Vines increase the damage your abilities deal to affected enemies by 5%.

Symbiotic Blooms increase the healing your spells do to affected targets by 20%.
